questions.question: One reason that ancient kingdoms in western Africa prospered was that they

choices.answer: Were located along the Tigris and Euphrates rivers
Had no contact with the rest of the world
Followed the Hindu beliefs of their rulers
Developed extensive trade in gold, ivory, and salt

questions.question: Which factor contributed to the success of the vast empire created by the Mongols?

choices.answer: Paying monetary tribute to local rulers

questions.question: Which term describes a society in which the landed aristocracy has most of the political power?
What were the major classes of people under Japanese feudalism?

Which achievement is most closely associated with Mansa Musa of Mali?

choices.answer: An increase in the influence of Islam and Islamic culture
The discovery of diamonds in the Congo
The defeat and capture of Cairo
An exclusive trade agreement with European merchants

questions.question: The existence of the civilizations of Ghana, Axum, Kush, and Mali demonstrates that

choices.answer: Industrial technology was needed for African civilizations
The continent was unified under a single political system
Societies developed in Africa before European colonization

questions.question: Which supports the claim that diversity was an important characteristic of the Mongol Empire?

choices.answer: All people in the Mongol Empire were Hindu.
The Mongols ruled China, Russia, eastern Europe and India.
Genghis organized a network of communication.
The Mongol Empire covered only central Asia.

questions.question: Reestablished trade, created an empire from Eastern Europe to the Pacific coast of Asia. Who?

During Japanese feudalism, the emperor had mainly symbolic authority. Why?

choices.answer: Power had been granted to shoguns and daimyos.
Guerrillas had destabilized domestic political institutions.
A constitution stopped the emperor from having authority.
American occupation had undermined the  emperor’s divinity.

questions.question: The restoration of Chinese rule, the voyages of Zheng He,  are all associated with the
Which description best fits kingdoms of Ghana and Songhai?
The Ming dynasty under Emperor Yonglo (Zhu di) used Zheng He’s voyages to

choices.answer: Expand trade with Africa and Southeast Asia
Explore North America and South America
Obtain a military alliance with Russia
Secure a border agreement with Mongolia

questions.question: Which statement best explains the relationship among groups of people under feudalism?

choices.answer: All classes received equal treatment before the law.
Social classes were determined by education achievements.
Obligations among social classes were clearly defined.
Strong governments passed laws to maintain class structures.

questions.question: In medieval Japan, the feudal system was dominated by
The isolationism of the Tokugawa shogunate included

choices.answer: Forbidding Chinese and Dutch merchants from trading.

questions.question: The Mongol Empire was greatly expanded under the “Universal Ruler,”
What Japanese feudal class were warriors found in?
The primary reason that the Bantu people of West Africa migrated southward and eastward was to

choices.answer: Find land for farming and grazing
